+ # Frog8 Website - Cursor Rules
+ 
+ ## Project Overview
+ This is the Frog8 company website - a professional B2B platform showcasing fintech and infrastructure solutions. The site emphasizes modern design with glassmorphism, smooth animations, and a distinctive lime-green brand identity.
+ 
+ ## Tech Stack
+ - **Framework**: Astro 5.14.1 (Static Site Generation)
+ - **UI Components**: React 19.1.0 (for interactive elements only)
+ - **3D Graphics**: Three.js 0.177.0
+ - **Styling**: CSS (scoped styles in Astro components)
+ - **TypeScript**: Strict mode enabled
+ 
+ ## Design System
+ 
+ ### Brand Colors (PRIMARY - NEVER CHANGE)
+ ```css
+ --primary: #a7d221        /* Frog8 lime green */
+ --primary-light: #b8e32e  /* Lighter variant */
+ --primary-dark: #8fb31c   /* Darker variant */
+ --background: #ffffff
+ --background-light: #f8f9fa
+ --text: #1a1a1a
+ --text-muted: #6b7280
+ ```
+ 
+ ### Typography
+ - **Primary Font**: Inter (Google Fonts) - professional, modern
+ - **Headings**: Font weights 600-800, letter-spacing: -0.02em
+ - **Body**: Font weight 400-500, line-height: 1.6-1.7
+ - **Responsive**: Use clamp() for fluid typography
+ 
+ ### Spacing System
+ - Use 8px base unit (0.5rem increments)
+ - Container max-width: 1280px
+ - Section padding: 120px vertical (desktop), 60px (mobile)
+ 
+ ## Code Quality Standards
+ 
+ ### File Organization
+ ```
+ src/
+ ‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ components/     # Reusable UI components
+ ‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ layouts/        # Page layouts (Layout.astro)
+ ‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ pages/          # Route pages (index.astro, about.astro, etc.)
+ ‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ assets/         # Images, icons, logos
+ ‚îî‚îÄ‚îÄ styles/         # Global styles (if needed)
+ ```
+ 
+ ### Naming Conventions
+ - **Files**: PascalCase for components (Navigation.astro, MobileMenu.jsx)
+ - **Pages**: lowercase with hyphens (about.astro, contact.astro)
+ - **CSS Classes**: kebab-case (nav-link, btn-primary, tvm-card)
+ - **Variables**: camelCase in JS, kebab-case in CSS
+ 
+ ### Component Guidelines
+ 
+ #### Astro Components (.astro)
+ ```astro
+ ---
+ // 1. Imports first
+ import Layout from '../layouts/Layout.astro';
+ import Component from '../components/Component.astro';
+ 
+ // 2. Props interface (if needed)
+ export interface Props {
+   title?: string;
+ }
+ 
+ // 3. Props destructuring with defaults
+ const { title = "Default Title" } = Astro.props;
+ ---
+ 
+ <!-- 4. HTML structure -->
+ <Layout>
+   <!-- Semantic HTML5 elements -->
+   <section class="section">
+     <div class="container">
+       <!-- Content -->
+     </div>
+   </section>
+ </Layout>
+ 
+ <style>
+   /* 5. Scoped styles at bottom */
+   .section {
+     /* Component-specific styles */
+   }
+ </style>
+ ```
+ 
+ #### React Components (.jsx)
+ - Use ONLY for interactive features (menus, galleries, modals)
+ - Add `client:load` directive in Astro for hydration
+ - Export default function ComponentName()
+ - Use hooks (useState, useEffect) appropriately
+ - Include PropTypes or TypeScript types
+ 
+ ## Design Patterns
+ 
+ ### Glassmorphism (SIGNATURE STYLE)
+ ```css
+ .glass {
+   background: linear-gradient(135deg, 
+     rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.9) 0%, 
+     rgba(248, 250, 252, 0.95) 100%
+   );
+   backdrop-filter: blur(20px);
+   border: 1px solid rgba(167, 210, 33, 0.1);
+   border-radius: 24px;
+   box-shadow: 
+     0 8px 32px rgba(167, 210, 33, 0.08),
+     0 4px 16px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.04);
+ }
+ ```
+ 
+ ### Animations (SMOOTH & PROFESSIONAL)
+ - Use `cubic-bezier(0.4, 0, 0.2, 1)` for transitions
+ - Hover effects: translateY(-8px) with shadow increase
+ - Page load: fade-in, slide-up animations
+ - Keep animations under 0.6s duration
+ - Add `will-change` for performance on heavy animations
+ 
+ ### Button Styles
+ ```css
+ .btn-primary {
+   background: linear-gradient(135deg, #a7d221 0%, #b8e32e 100%);
+   color: white;
+   padding: 14px 28px;
+   border-radius: 16px;
+   font-weight: 600;
+   transition: all 0.3s cubic-bezier(0.4, 0, 0.2, 1);
+ }
+ 
+ .btn-primary:hover {
+   transform: translateY(-2px);
+   box-shadow: 0 10px 20px rgba(167, 210, 33, 0.3);
+ }
+ ```
+ 
+ ## Responsive Design (MOBILE-FIRST)
+ 
+ ### Breakpoints
+ ```css
+ /* Mobile: < 480px (base styles) */
+ @media (max-width: 480px) { }
+ 
+ /* Small tablets: 640px */
+ @media (max-width: 640px) { }
+ 
+ /* Tablets: 768px */
+ @media (max-width: 768px) { }
+ 
+ /* Large tablets: 900px */
+ @media (max-width: 900px) { }
+ 
+ /* Desktop: 1024px+ */
+ @media (min-width: 1024px) { }
+ ```
+ 
+ ### Mobile Optimization Rules
+ 1. Stack grid columns on mobile (grid-cols-1)
+ 2. Reduce padding: p-8 ‚Üí p-4 on small screens
+ 3. Font sizes: Use clamp() or reduce by 20-30%
+ 4. Hide decorative elements on mobile (particles, background effects)
+ 5. Full-width buttons on mobile
+ 6. Increase touch target sizes (min 44px)
+ 
+ ## Content & Messaging
+ 
+ ### Tone of Voice
+ - **Professional**: B2B audience (banks, metros, enterprises)
+ - **Confident**: "Powering India Next" - authoritative
+ - **Clear & Concise**: No jargon unless industry-specific
+ - **Action-Oriented**: "Get Started", "Learn More", "Schedule Demo"
+ 
+ ### Copywriting Rules
+ 1. Headlines: Action-oriented, benefit-focused
+ 2. Descriptions: 1-2 sentences max, value-first
+ 3. CTAs: Clear next steps, contrasting buttons
+ 4. Technical specs: Bulleted lists, easy to scan
+ 5. Avoid: Marketing fluff, excessive adjectives, vague claims
+ 
+ ### SEO Best Practices
+ - Unique title/description per page
+ - Descriptive alt text for all images
+ - Semantic HTML5 (section, article, nav, header, footer)
+ - Heading hierarchy (h1 ‚Üí h2 ‚Üí h3)
+ - Internal linking between related pages
+ 
+ ## Performance
+ 
+ ### Image Optimization
+ - Use Astro's Image component for optimization
+ - Add `loading="lazy"` for below-fold images
+ - Add `loading="eager"` for hero images
+ - WebP format preferred, PNG fallback
+ - Max width: 2000px for hero images
+ 
+ ### Code Splitting
+ - Keep React components minimal
+ - Use `client:load` only when necessary
+ - Consider `client:visible` for below-fold interactive elements
+ - Lazy load heavy components (3D models, galleries)
+ 
+ ## Accessibility (WCAG 2.1 AA)
+ 
+ ### Essential Requirements
+ 1. **Color Contrast**: 4.5:1 minimum for text
+ 2. **Keyboard Navigation**: All interactive elements accessible via keyboard
+ 3. **ARIA Labels**: Add to icon-only buttons, navigation
+ 4. **Focus Indicators**: Visible focus states on all interactive elements
+ 5. **Alt Text**: Descriptive for meaningful images, empty for decorative
+ 6. **Semantic HTML**: Use proper elements (button, nav, main, etc.)
+ 
+ ### Implementation
+ ```html
+ <!-- Good -->
+ <button aria-label="Open menu" class="menu-btn">
+   <svg aria-hidden="true">...</svg>
+ </button>
+ 
+ <!-- Bad -->
+ <div onclick="openMenu()">...</div>
+ ```
+ 
+ ## Component-Specific Rules
+ 
+ ### Navigation
+ - Fixed position, glassmorphism background
+ - Desktop: horizontal links with hover effects
+ - Mobile: Fullscreen overlay menu (React component)
+ - Sticky on scroll, blur backdrop
+ - Logo always links to homepage
+ 
+ ### Footer
+ - 4-column layout (Company, Products, Resources, Connect)
+ - Social icons with hover effects
+ - Copyright year dynamic: {new Date().getFullYear()}
+ - Links in dark text on light glass background
+ 
+ ### Hero Sections
+ - Full viewport height (min-height: 100vh)
+ - Animated background (particles, floating orbs, grid)
+ - Gradient text for brand keywords
+ - Clear CTA buttons below fold
+ - Text shadow for readability
+ 
+ ### Cards
+ - Use `.glass` or `.card-premium` classes
+ - Hover: lift with shadow increase
+ - Rounded corners (20-24px)
+ - Consistent padding (2rem desktop, 1rem mobile)
+ 
+ ## Git Workflow
+ 
+ ### Commit Messages
+ - Format: `type: description`
+ - Types: feat, fix, style, refactor, docs, perf, test
+ - Examples:
+   - `feat: add partner logos to deployments page`
+   - `fix: mobile menu not closing on link click`
+   - `style: update button hover animations`
+ 
+ ### Before Committing
+ 1. Test on mobile viewport (< 480px)
+ 2. Check all interactive elements
+ 3. Verify no console errors
+ 4. Run `npm run build` to check for build errors
+ 5. Validate links and images
+ 
+ ## Testing Checklist
+ 
+ ### Pre-Deployment
+ - [ ] All pages load without errors
+ - [ ] Forms submit correctly
+ - [ ] Navigation works (desktop + mobile)
+ - [ ] Images load and are optimized
+ - [ ] Responsive on 320px, 768px, 1920px
+ - [ ] Animations smooth (no janky transitions)
+ - [ ] Colors match brand guidelines
+ - [ ] Contact info up to date
+ - [ ] External links open in new tabs
+ - [ ] WhatsApp integration working
+ 
+ ### Browser Compatibility
+ - Chrome (latest)
+ - Safari (latest)
+ - Firefox (latest)
+ - Edge (latest)
+ - Mobile Safari (iOS)
+ - Mobile Chrome (Android)
+ 
+ ## Common Patterns to Follow
+ 
+ ### Section Structure
+ ```astro
+ <section class="section gradient-bg pt-32">
+   <div class="container">
+     <div class="text-center mb-16">
+       <h2 class="slide-up mb-6">
+         Heading <span class="text-green">Highlight</span>
+       </h2>
+       <p class="text-xl max-w-3xl mx-auto">
+         Description text
+       </p>
+     </div>
+     
+     <div class="grid grid-cols-1 md:grid-cols-3 gap-8">
+       <!-- Grid items -->
+     </div>
+   </div>
+ </section>
+ 
+ <div class="section-divider"></div>
+ ```
+ 
+ ### Form Inputs
+ ```astro
+ <div>
+   <label for="name" class="f8-label">Full Name *</label>
+   <input
+     type="text"
+     id="name"
+     name="name"
+     required
+     class="f8-input"
+     placeholder="Your full name"
+   />
+ </div>
+ ```
+ 
+ ## What NOT to Do
+ 
+ ‚ùå **Never** change the primary brand color (#a7d221)
+ ‚ùå **Never** use inline styles (use scoped CSS or classes)
+ ‚ùå **Never** add external CSS frameworks (Tailwind, Bootstrap)
+ ‚ùå **Never** use jQuery or legacy libraries
+ ‚ùå **Never** create pages without proper SEO meta tags
+ ‚ùå **Never** use `!important` in CSS (refactor specificity instead)
+ ‚ùå **Never** add animations longer than 1 second
+ ‚ùå **Never** break mobile responsiveness
+ ‚ùå **Never** remove accessibility features
+ ‚ùå **Never** hardcode contact info (use centralized variables)
+ 
+ ## When Adding New Features
+ 
+ ### Process
+ 1. **Plan**: Sketch layout, consider mobile-first
+ 2. **Design**: Use brand colors, glassmorphism, smooth animations
+ 3. **Code**: Follow file structure, naming conventions
+ 4. **Test**: All breakpoints, interactions, accessibility
+ 5. **Optimize**: Images, code splitting, performance
+ 6. **Document**: Update README if significant change
+ 
+ ### Questions to Ask
+ - Does this fit the brand identity (professional, modern)?
+ - Is it responsive on all screen sizes?
+ - Does it maintain the glassmorphism aesthetic?
+ - Is the animation smooth and purposeful?
+ - Does it improve user experience?
+ - Is it accessible?
+ 
+ ## Emergency Contacts
+ - Sales Email: sales@f8payments.com
+ - Phone: +91-9820459958
+ - Location: Mumbai, India
+ 
+ ## Version Control
+ - Last Updated: October 2025
+ - Astro Version: 5.14.1
+ - React Version: 19.1.0

```diff
@@ -1,1 +1,97 @@
- 
+ import { useEffect, useRef } from 'react';
+ 
+ export default function UnicornStudioEmbed({ projectId = "hofrlOLdrmuX0SYTFUfO", width = "100%", height = "900px" }) {
+   const elementRef = useRef(null);
+   const sceneRef = useRef(null);
+ 
+   useEffect(() => {
+     // Initialize script
+     const initializeScript = (callback) => {
+       const existingScript = document.querySelector('script[src^="https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/hiunicornstudio/unicornstudio.js"]');
+       
+       if (!existingScript) {
+         const script = document.createElement("script");
+         script.src = "https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/hiunicornstudio/unicornstudio.js@v1.4.33/dist/unicornStudio.umd.js";
+         script.onload = callback;
+         script.onerror = () => console.error("Failed to load UnicornStudio script");
+         document.head.appendChild(script);
+       } else {
+         if (window.UnicornStudio) {
+           callback();
+         } else {
+           const waitForLoad = setInterval(() => {
+             if (window.UnicornStudio) {
+               clearInterval(waitForLoad);
+               callback();
+             }
+           }, 100);
+         }
+       }
+     };
+ 
+     // Initialize Unicorn Studio
+     const initializeUnicornStudio = () => {
+       if (projectId && elementRef.current) {
+         elementRef.current.setAttribute("data-us-project", projectId);
+ 
+         if (window.UnicornStudio) {
+           // Check for existing scene
+           const existingScene = window.UnicornStudio.scenes?.find(
+             scene => scene.element === elementRef.current || 
+                      scene.element?.contains(elementRef.current)
+           );
+ 
+           if (existingScene) {
+             existingScene.destroy();
+           }
+ 
+           // Initialize new scene
+           window.UnicornStudio.init().then(scenes => {
+             const ourScene = scenes.find(
+               scene => scene.element === elementRef.current || 
+                        scene.element?.contains(elementRef.current)
+             );
+             if (ourScene) {
+               sceneRef.current = ourScene;
+             }
+           }).catch(err => {
+             console.error("Failed to initialize UnicornStudio:", err);
+           });
+         }
+       }
+     };
+ 
+     if (projectId) {
+       if (window.UnicornStudio) {
+         initializeUnicornStudio();
+       } else {
+         initializeScript(initializeUnicornStudio);
+       }
+     }
+ 
+     // Cleanup
+     return () => {
+       if (sceneRef.current) {
+         sceneRef.current.destroy();
+         sceneRef.current = null;
+       }
+     };
+   }, [projectId]);
+ 
+   return (
+     <div 
+       ref={elementRef}
+       data-us-dpi="1.5"
+       data-us-scale="1"
+       data-us-fps="60"
+       style={{
+         width: width,
+         height: height,
+         position: 'relative',
+         zIndex: 1,
+       }}
+       aria-label="Interactive 3D Animation"
+     />
+   );
+ }
+ 
```

</details>
